thread.title: Amitabh Bachchan requests UP govt to pass on his monthly pension to the needy
thread.title_full: Amitabh Bachchan requests UP govt to pass on his monthly pension to the needy - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Amitabh Bachchan requests UP govt to pass on his monthly pension to the needy
text:
Bollywood superstar Amitabh Bachchan has issued a statement after Uttar Pradesh government announced a pension scheme of Rs 50,000 for Yash Bharti awardees of the state, which include his wife Jaya Bachchan, son Abhishek Bachchan and himself.
In his statement, Amitabh Bachchan has requested the UP government to pass on the ... Â»
